title: Hamburg coach Bruno Labbadia extends contract by 1 season
title_page: Hamburg coach Bruno Labbadia extends contract by 1 season | Daily Mail Online
text:
Hamburg coach Bruno Labbadia extends contract by 1 season
HAMBURG, Germany (AP) — Hamburger SV coach Bruno Labbadia has extended his contract with the club by another year.
The Bundesliga side says the 49-year-old Labbadia, whose contract ran to the end of this season, has signed a deal through June 2017, along with assistant coaches Eddy Soezer and Bernhard Trares.
Hamburg chief executive Dietmar Beiersdorfer says "Bruno is taking on our joint task with passion and enthusiasm and he identifies strongly with Hamburg and the club. Bruno Labbadia is living our club."
